AI Description: R-NMF is an R package for performing Non-negative Matrix Factorization (NMF), a dimensionality reduction technique widely used in various fields, including bioinformatics, image processing, and natural language processing. It allows users to decompose a given data matrix into two lower-dimensional matrices, representing the underlying patterns and features in the data.
Core Features: Non-Negative Matrix Factorization (Nmf), Dimensionality Reduction, Clustering & Pattern Discovery, Sparse Coding, Topic Modeling
General Tags: Data Analysis, Machine Learning, Dimensionality Reduction, Pattern Recognition
